name: Esty ARDUINO, Appellant, v. BOROUGH OF DUNMORE, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
Justices CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO dissent.
parties: Esty ARDUINO, Appellant, v. BOROUGH OF DUNMORE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justices CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Christopher P. Cullen, Dunmore, for Esty Arduino.
Robert C. Cordaro, Terrence J. McDonald, Dunmore, for Borough of Dunmore.
casebody.head_matter:
741 A.2d 195
Esty ARDUINO, Appellant, v. BOROUGH OF DUNMORE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 16, 1999.
Decided Dec. 10, 1999.
Christopher P. Cullen, Dunmore, for Esty Arduino.
Robert C. Cordaro, Terrence J. McDonald, Dunmore, for Borough of Dunmore.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
